code: import React from'react';import'./App.css';import{FacebookProvider,LoginButton}from'react-facebook';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{loginAction,fbdata as _fbdata}from'./actions';import{withRouter}from'react-router-dom';function Facebook(props){var handleResponse=function handleResponse(data){console.log('facebookdata ',data);props.fbdata(data);props.login(data.tokenDetail.accessToken);};var handleError=function handleError(error){console.log(error);};return React.createElement("div",{className:"App"},React.createElement(FacebookProvider,{appId:"783983335073350",version:"v3.0"},React.createElement(LoginButton,{scope:"public_profile,publish_pages,email,pages_messaging,pages_manage_cta,pages_show_list,manage_pages",onCompleted:handleResponse,onError:handleError,className:"facebookbtn"},React.createElement("span",null,props.content.toUpperCase()))));}var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{user:state.userdata||{}};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch,owenProps){return{login:function login(token){return dispatch(loginAction(token,owenProps));},fbdata:function fbdata(data){return dispatch(_fbdata(data));}};};export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Facebook));
